Всем рекомендую эту игру. Система повышения работает на высшем уровне, меня даже не повышают. Отзывчивые разработчики и игроки (нет). Каждую катку попадаются Пендосы играть не возможно. За первый игру я уже сломал ножки на клавиатуре. Игра хорошая! Всем рекомендую.

Easy to pickup, huge community, gambling opportunities to win money (only if you're stupid), difficult ranked system (good for talented players) not nearly as much trolling as there used to be and a good ingame communication system
I've loved this game it is easy to get into but can be a real challenge when you get into the higher ranks. It is a game of true skill and nothing more.
Melhorzin que está tendo no momento . heheh

The Counter-Strike series are a part of the line of classics that came from Valve. That being said, it is also a game that caters to the community that has also harbored this game since before the turn of the millennium. 


What I mean is that if you are not a part of the old-school styled FPS, it will be challenging for you to rise in the ranks if you are a casual player like myself. My problem with this game is the aiming system. The aiming system has never been changed, following the tactics of "spray-patterns", which is predicting where the bullets will fly, forcing the player to dance alongside these patterns.

6/10
Game Top. Muito Estrategico e dinamico, com muitos recursos para um bom game competitivo...
